mapper.sql: admin_num, admin_login_name, admin_password, admin_mobile, state, create_time, update_time, last_opt_name, is_del, is_frozen, is_authentication
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_admin
admin_num,
admin_login_name,
admin_password,
admin_mobile,
state,
create_time,
update_time,
last_opt_name,
is_del,
is_frozen,
is_authentication,
#{adminNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adminLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adminMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
now(), now(),
#{lastOptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
#{isFrozen,jdbcType=BIT},
#{isAuthentication,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update sys_admin
admin_num = #{adminNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_login_name = #{adminLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
admin_mobile = #{adminMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = now(),
last_opt_name = #{lastOptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
is_frozen = #{isFrozen,jdbcType=BIT},
is_authentication = #{isAuthentication,jdbcType=BIT},
where admin_num = #{adminNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select a.admin_num ,a.admin_mobile,a.admin_login_name,a.create_time from sys_admin a LEFT JOIN sys_se_a_relationship b on a.admin_num = b.a_num LEFT JOIN sys_admin c on b.se_num = c.admin_num
AND c.admin_num = #{seNum}
